synopsis.text: Having lived an extraordinary life devoid of close friends and typical experiences, Misato Kurihara yearns for normality. After a tragic end to her life, she is granted a divine audience and seizes the opportunity to request an average existence in her next life. Reincarnated as Adele von Ascham, the daughter of a noble, she soon discovers that her powers exceed the realm of ordinary. Determined to live the life she's always dreamed of, Adele adopts the alias 'Mile' and enrolls in a hunter school far from home. Despite her best efforts to conceal her extraordinary abilities, she finds herself entangled in a series of unpredictable situations. As she navigates through her new life, she must confront the challenges that arise from her unanticipated powers while striving to attain the ordinary happiness she's always desired.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
